name: ConnectMe
0: ”Alexa, ask Connect Me for more info”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: connect me
des:
Connect Me allows you to connect with your favorite brands for the latest deals, promotions, and content.

While you are listening to a radio station or podcast, you may hear content that prompts you to ask your smart speaker to connect me with a brand. 

Follow instructions you hear in order to connect with the brand on your smart speaker through Connect Me.
